article.Heading: Budget 2016: DLF rises 6% on 100% deduction under affordable housing scheme
article.Summary: Construction companies like DLF and NBCC rose 3-6 percent intraday Monday as government has proposed 100 percent deduction to undertakings for construction under affordable housing.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Construction companies like DLF and NBCC rose 3-6 percent intraday Monday as government has proposed 100 percent deduction to undertakings for construction under affordable housing.

At 13:23 hrs DLF was quoting at Rs 91.40, up Rs 4.15, or 4.76 percent.

National Buildings Construction Corporation (NBCC) was quoting at Rs 882.05, up Rs 13.25, or 1.53 percent.
